item.title: Overleaf and AI workflow - Streamlining presentation creation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This blog post introduces an innovative and remarkably efficient workflow that seamlessly integrates the strengths of two powerful platforms: Overleaf, the leading collaborative LaTeX editor renowned for its academic focus and precision, and Dify, an open-source LLM application development platform designed to simplify the creation and deployment of AI-powered solutions.
